title: Hitchcock at his supreme best
review: Wow this is a phenomenal film. Everything about it is outstanding. Truly one of his best. I've seen it over 20 times and if anything I love it more now than ever.

title: Stunning performances
review: Didn't know what to expect from this film but was seriously impressed. Bradley Cooper and lady gaga are superb. The first 40 minutes or so is fantastic. Does lose it a little after but never lost my interest. Hope to see more acting by lady gaga and more singing by Bradley Cooper.

title: Astonishing film
review: Never seen another film like this, every single actor acts knocks it out of the park, it's one of the most clever films I have ever seen. I was gripped from the beginning to the end. An absolute masterpiece in every way.

title: Christopher Nolan's greatest film
review: Where do you begin with this film, it's chritopher Nolan's best film. What a film. Gets you thinking all the way through. Greatest soundtrack of any film I've ever seen.

title: Jack Nicholson at his very best
review: This is truly one of the greatest films of all time not just horror any film. Jack Nicholson is unbelievably scary, my wife saw it for the first time yesterday and loved it. Stanley Kubricks masterpiece, 1 of the greatest directors.

title: Probably Christopher Nolan's worst film
review: This is not a bad film it's just not as good as the rest of his back catalogue. It doesn't flow and looks like he wasn't quite sure on how to tell the story properly. Some good performances. Wanted to love this film but just didn't. Watched it in the cinema and came out with my ears ringing, just too loud.

title: Great film but has its flaws
review: Christopher Nolan is a genius but this isn't his best, the soundtrack spoils the film. There are some great performances. It could and should have been so much better.

title: One of the greatest war films
review: This film is astonishing, Liam neeson at his very best, Spielberg at his very best. A film to seriously make you think. You will remember this along time after you first see it, truly an absolute masterpiece.

title: Watch it again, it's not as good as you thought it was
review: Seen this film a few times, used to love it but at the end of the day it's not great, it's mainly set in 1 room and not much happens. Most people remember it for one scene. It's genuinely not a great film. Watch it again and I guarantee you won't think it's as good as you remembered it was.

title: Daniel day Lewis at his best
review: This film is absolutely fantastic. Daniel day Lewis is superb and genuinely scary. He is one of the greatest actors ever. The ending is mind blowing. An absolute credit to everyone involved with this masterpiece.

title: Joaquin Phoenix is unbelievable,,mind blowing performance
review: Joaquin Phoenix is out of this world, very good film but not the greatest film ever. A little disturbing in places. Very clever film. Lots of nods to other similar ish films like taxi driver, psycho, king of comedy, clockwork orange. Thought provoking. Didn't live up to the hype personally. Todd Philips did a great job and I hope does similar stuff in the future.

title: A film to change your life
review: I have seen this film over 25 times, it's the best film ever made. There is nothing bad about tit. Look forward to watching it another 25 times. Thank you frank darabont and everybody else that was a part of this absolute masterpiece. We should have a shawshank redemption day!!

title: An all time classic horror
review: I've seen this film a few times and it gets better and better, James wan is a genius. From the beginning to the end it's excellent.

title: Probably one of the worst films I've ever seen
review: Wtf, just an absolutely pathetic pile of nonsense, why would anybody like this film. Pointless and an absolute joke.

title: An absolute classic
review: One of the greatest films of the era. Fantastic performances by many of the cast. Gary oldman is fantastic. Great film from beginning to end.
